title: Any senior who got placed in a tier-1 company with 7 or below Cgpa?

comments.body: Yes, I got 6.8 cgpa. Got placed in Microsoft with a 28lpa package.
Cap Microsoft asks for 8 cgpa off campus
Well I wouldn't be working here if that was the case.
Post me tier-1 likha h tune and fir cap bol rha, ironyðŸ’€
Toh tier 1 placement milna possible nai hai cse ke liye with 7 cgpa
Offcampus?On-campus?Can you tell your placement story in brief?
Yeah,  I got it off- campus.  I leveraged my options. Intel, J P Morgan and IBM wanted me to join them for less than 25lpa, but Microsoft was willing to pay more. So, I joined them.
All companies have rejected me except the service based companies (reason low cgpa 7.1)
yes there are many, some even with 6. something cgpa
Backlog, mech and 6.3 at the time of placement for SDE role lol. Startup though, probably why they didn't care.
